mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_asm_field (asm_field_id, project_id, asm_obj_id, asm_obj_name, asm_field_name, is_static, created_time, updated_time) values
(#{field.asmFieldId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{field.projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{field.asmObjId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{field.asmObjName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{field.asmFieldName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{field.isStatic,jdbcType=INTEGER}, now(), #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
